history.proof: intros. intros HCon. apply (contradiction T Con HCon). + shelve. + shelve.

exceptions.tactic: apply (Rosser'sIncompleteness T extendsPA repT v0 freeVarRepT expressT1 expressT2).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con Unable to unify "exists f : Formula, (forall v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT f)) /\\ (SysPrf T f \\/ SysPrf T (notH f) -> Inconsistent LNT T)" with "Inconsistent LNT T".

In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con HCon : fol.Formula LNT Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm ?M1509), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (orH (notH Con) Con)) g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm HCon), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g".

In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con HCon : fol.Formula LNT Unable to unify "SysPrf T (impH Con (notH Con))" with "SysPrf T Con".

exceptions.tactic: apply (impTrans T Con (andH (box F) (impH Con (notH Con))) F).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con HCon : fol.Formula LNT Unable to unify "SysPrf T (impH Con F)" with "SysPrf T Con".

In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con HCon : fol.Formula LNT Unable to unify "SysPrf T (box F)" with "SysPrf T Con".

In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con HCon : fol.Formula LNT The term "HBL2" has type "forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f)))" while it is expected to have type "SysPrf T (impH (box (box F)) (box F))".
Illegal application (Non-functional construction): The expression "HBL2 F" of type "SysPrf T (impH (box F) (box (box F)))" cannot be applied to the term "box F" : "fol.Formula LNT"

exceptions.tactic: apply (impI T (notH (andH (box F) (impH Con (notH Con)))) F).

In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) H : SysPrf T Con HCon : fol.Formula LNT Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm ?M1511), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (orH (notH (box F)) (box F))) g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm Con), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System
extendsPA: Included Formula PA T
repT: Formula
v0: nat
freeVarRepT: forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0
expressT1: forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))
expressT2: forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))
HBL2: forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f)))
HBL3: forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g)))

Goal:
SysPrf T Con -> Inconsistent LNT T

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n))
codeFormula = code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation : fol.Formula LNT -> nat
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
Inconsistent : forall L : Language, fol.System L -> Prop
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
impH = fol.impH LNT : fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Con = notH (box F) : fol.Formula LNT
notH = fol.notH LNT : fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
PA = Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6 : Ensemble Formula
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
box = fun f : Formula => substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula codeSysPf) 0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)) : Formula -> fol.Formula LNT
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) HBL2 : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T (impH (box f) (box (box f))) HBL3 : forall f g : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T (impH (box (impH f g)) (impH (box f) (box g))) |- Type]
Rosser'sIncompleteness : forall T : System, Included Formula PA T -> forall (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0) -> (forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) -> (forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))) -> (forall x : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x \/ ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x) -> exists f : Formula, (forall v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT f)) /\ (SysPrf T f \/ SysPrf T (notH f) -> Inconsistent LNT T)
rosserPA.expressT'2 : forall (T : System) (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))) -> forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN (rosserPA.T' T) (fol.notH LNN (substituteFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0 (natToTermLNN (codeFormula f))))
rosserPA.expressT'1 : forall (T : System) (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) -> forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN (rosserPA.T' T) (substituteFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0 (natToTermLNN (codeFormula f)))
codeSysPrfNCorrect2 : forall (T : System) (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0) ->...-> forall p : Prf LNT A (fol.notH LNT f), LNN.SysPrf (rosserPA.T' T) (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNot LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation codeArityLNTF codeArityLNTR codeArityLNTFIsPR codeArityLNTRIsPR (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation A (fol.notH LNT f) p))))
codeSysPrfCorrect2 : forall (T : System) (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0) ->...-> forall p : Prf LNT A f, LNN.SysPrf (rosserPA.T' T) (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation codeArityLNTF codeArityLNTR codeArityLNTFIsPR codeArityLNTRIsPR (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation A f p))))
codeSysPrfNCorrect1 : forall (T : System) (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf (rosserPA.T' T) (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNot LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation codeArityLNTF codeArityLNTR codeArityLNTFIsPR codeArityLNTRIsPR (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation A (fol.notH LNT f) p)))
codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (T : System) (repT : Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0) -> (forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf (rosserPA.T' T) (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation codeArityLNTF codeArityLNTR codeArityLNTFIsPR codeArityLNTRIsPR (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation A f p)))
HBL1 : forall f : fol.Formula LNT, SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (box f)
FirstIncompletenessA = fun H : SysPrf T G => let s := FixPointLNT (notH (LNN2LNT_formula codeSysPf)) 0 in (let (x, a) as s0 return (SysPrf T (let (a, _) := s0 in a) -> Inconsistent LNT T) := s in match a with | conj H1 _ => fun (H0 : SysPrf T x) (f : fol.Formula LNT) => contradiction T x f H0 (impE T (notH x) (notH (substituteFormula LNT (notH (LNN2LNT_formula codeSysPf)) 0 (natToTerm (codeFormula x)))) (cp2 T (substituteFormula LNT (notH (LNN2LNT_formula codeSysPf)) 0 (natToTerm (codeFormula x))) x (iffE1 T x (substituteFormula LNT (notH (LNN2LNT_formula codeSysPf)) 0 (...
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
induct : forall (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v f)
searchProof : forall T : System, (forall x : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x \/ ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x) -> forall (a b : Formula) (A : Formulas) (p : Prf LNT A a), (exists (B : Formulas) (q : Prf LNT B b), codePrf B b q < S (codePrf A a p) /\ (forall x : Formula, In x B -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T x)) \/ (forall (B : Formulas) (q : Prf LNT B b), codePrf B b q < S (codePrf A a p) -> exists g : Formula, In g B /\ ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g)
cp2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g))
codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf L codeF codeR A f p)))
codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A f, LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf L codeF codeR A f p))))
codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p)))
codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A (fol.notH L f), LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p))))
impTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h)
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (orH f g)) h
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t)
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
T'prf2Tprf : forall T : System, Included Formula PA T -> forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN (rosserPA.T' T) f -> SysPrf T (LNN2LNT_formula f)
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
nAnd : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (orH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (notH (andH f g))
PAboundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf PA (impH (LNN2LNT_formula (LNN.LT (fol.var LNN x) (LNN.natToTerm m))) a)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
PA7 = fun (f : Formula) (v : nat) => close LNT (impH (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) (impH (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) (forallH v f))) : Formula -> nat -> Formula Arguments PA7 _ _%nat_scope
translateProof : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), ClosedSystem LNT V -> (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)
LNN2LNT_subFormula : forall (T : System) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), SysPrf T (iffH (LNN2LNT_formula (substituteFormula LNN f v s)) (substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f) v (LNN2LNT_term s)))
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)

```coq
intros.
apply (Rosser'sIncompleteness T extendsPA repT v0 freeVarRepT expressT1 expressT2).
- intros HCon.
  apply (orSys T (notH Con) Con).
  + apply (contradiction T Con HCon).
  + apply (impTrans T Con (notH (box F)) (notH Con)).
    * apply (impTrans T Con (andH (box F) (impH Con (notH Con))) F).
      ++ apply (HBL1 F).
         apply (Axm T (box F)).
         apply (impE T (box F) (box (box F)) HBL2).
         apply (HBL2 F (box F)).
      ++ apply (impI T (notH (andH (box F) (impH Con (notH Con)))) F).
         apply (orSys T (notH (box F)) (box F)).
         -- apply (impI T (box (impH F (impH Con (notH Con))) (notH (box F))).
            apply (impE T (notH (box F)) (notH (box (box F))) HBL2).
            apply (impI T (andH F (impH Con (notH Con))) (box F)).
            apply (impe T F (andH F (impH Con (notH Con)))).
            ** apply (impE T (andH F (impH Con (notH Con))) F).
               +++ apply (iffE1 T F (andH F (impH Con (notH Con)))).
                   apply (impI T (andH F (impH Con (notH Con))) F).
                   apply (andI T F (impH Con (notH Con))).
                   *** apply (Axm T F).
                       apply (impE T F (box F) HBL3).
                       apply (HBL3 F (impH Con (notH Con))).
                   *** apply Axm. apply HBL1. apply Axm. apply Axm.
               +++ apply (orI2 T F (notH F)).
                   apply (Axm T (notH F)).
            ** apply (Axm T (box F)).
               apply (HBL1 F).
               apply (Axm T F).
         -- apply (andI T (box F) (impH Con (notH Con))).
            ** apply (Axm T (box F)).
            ** apply (Axm T (impH Con (notH Con))).
    * apply (impI T (notH F) Con).
      apply (contradiction T F HCon).
- intros f Hf.
  apply (translateProof (rosperPA.T' T) T).
  + intros g Hg.
    apply (sysWeaken T (box g) (impH (box g) (notH (box f)))).
    * apply (HBL1 g).
    * apply (HBL2 g).
    * apply (HBL3 (impH g (notH (box f))) (box g)).
  + apply (closeTranslation f).
  + apply Hf.
Qed.
```

original: intros. apply (Rosser'sIncompleteness T extendsPA repT v0 freeVarRepT expressT1 expressT2). - intros HCon. apply (orSys T (notH Con) Con). + apply (contradiction T Con HCon). + apply (impTrans T Con (notH (box F)) (notH Con)). * apply (impTrans T Con (andH (box F) (impH Con (notH Con))) F). ++ apply (HBL1 F). apply (Axm T (box F)). apply (impE T (box F) (box (box F)) HBL2). apply (HBL2 F (box F)). ++ apply (impI T (notH (andH (box F) (impH Con (notH Con)))) F). apply (orSys T (notH (box F)) (box F)). --
